title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, a dialog is displayed that does not have a good default folder. It shows the desktop, my computer, etc. It would be better if there was a default content location for the dialog to point to. Additionally, it would be helpful if the dialog could remember the last folder from which I imported a project.
OB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog should have a default folder to provide a better starting point for the user. This could be the default content location.
EB: The dialog should remember the last folder from which a project was imported, providing a more convenient experience for the user.
SR: Please update the Import Project dialog to have a default folder, such as the default content location, and make it remember the last folder used for importing projects.
